text: Is anyone else having massive issues with the workflow builder today?
No, for me it's working fine. Check out with HubSpot Status
we don’t see anything on our end either, but do let us know if you continue to see issues (and what those issues are)
<@UHVJJUWFN> main issue is I'm unable to clone any multiple action sections, I get taken to a something went wrong page 100% of the time
are there any errors on the console or on the UI?

nice that’s a great error message
this certainly looks like a unique bug, likely an edge case we missed. Would you mind reaching out to support so they can open a customer ticket for us to take a look at?

I'm wondering if someone can lend me their brain for this one...:smiling_face_with_tear:

I am building a custom code workflow in HubSpot, where I want the following to happen:
• Enrollment Trigger: Company has a _Type_ Property = Partner _or_ Prospect Partner.
• I want HubSpot to fetch all associations to that Company (contacts, deals, activities, etc.)
• Automatically associate all of these objects and activities to the Associated Partner Custom Obj. to that original company.
I've built the below workflow code, which runs with no errors. Also when I try to debug it , it is able to retrieve the correct IDs. However when a Company enrolls in the workflow and completes the workflow, it doesn't actually change anything in HubSpot... I am wondering if I am doing something wrong? This is built in Node.js 20.x.
this is my code:

hey <@U071VPHRPL3> thanks for the suggestion! we already have a process like that in place to work around this but it's not very scalable because it needs to be updated when new users come and go. just wish i understood why this option used to be available and has since been taken away.
Hi <@U07284VB85Q>, I understand, if you have rotation it is not advisable to use this system, I hope they will enable it again. Regards!
